bug.author: lsy643
bug.summary: streamlit hello freeze when I connect it through web page
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
I start streamlit hello in a docker container in a remote server, and after I starts the hello app with typing 'streamlit hello', the server side works fine. When I connect the server with chrome, the app page comes out, but it just display a bar displaying 'Please wait' <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.49.0 Python version: 2.7.12 Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex?: No OS version: ubuntu 16.04 server Browser version: chrome
